entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
